businesslogic

Class ItemService

  • java.lang.Object
    • businesslogic.ItemService

  • public class ItemService
extends java.lang.Object
    Item Service handles all the operations regarding the Item Object, including inserting, deleting, updating and building.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String delete(java.lang.String itemName)
      Deletes an existing Item object from database based on its unique item name.
      java.util.List<Item> getAll()
      Retrieves all the items from the database using the itemBroker.
      Item getByItemName(java.lang.String itemName)
      Retrieves item Object (if found) by its unique name from the Broker.
      java.lang.String insert(java.lang.String itemName, java.lang.String quantity, java.lang.String category, java.lang.String description)
      Insert calls the ItemBroker class in order to insert a Item Object into the database.
      java.util.List<Item> searchItem(java.lang.String keyword)
      Searches through all existing items for matching keyword using itemBroker.
      java.lang.String update(Item itemNew)
      Updates existing item Object to match temporary new item Object
      java.lang.String update(java.lang.String itemName, java.lang.String quantity, java.lang.String category, java.lang.String description)
      Updates existing item Object by setting its attributes to new parameters

      • insert

        public java.lang.String insert(java.lang.String itemName,
                               java.lang.String quantity,
                               java.lang.String category,
                               java.lang.String description)
        Insert calls the ItemBroker class in order to insert a Item Object into the database.
        Parameters:
        itemName - name of the item as a String
        quantity - amount of the item as a String
        categorycategory - of the item as a String
        description - description of the item as a String
        Returns:
        status of insertion in database

      • getByItemName

        public Item getByItemName(java.lang.String itemName)
        Retrieves item Object (if found) by its unique name from the Broker.
        Parameters:
        itemName - name of the item to be retrieved
        Returns:
        item Object

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Item> getAll()
        Retrieves all the items from the database using the itemBroker.
        Returns:
        list of all item Objects in database

      • searchItem

        public java.util.List<Item> searchItem(java.lang.String keyword)
        Searches through all existing items for matching keyword using itemBroker.
        Parameters:
        keyword - search term entered
        Returns:
        list of item Objects which match keyword

      • update

        public java.lang.String update(java.lang.String itemName,
                               java.lang.String quantity,

        itemName - name of the item as a String
        quantity - amount of the item as a String
        categorycategory - of the item as a String
        description - description of the item as a String
        Returns:
        updated item Object

        Updates existing item Object to match temporary new item Object
        Parameters:
        itemNew - the new item Object
        Returns:
        status of update from database
